name: 古巫竞技场：序章 Ancient Witch Arena Prologue
name_original: 古巫竞技场：序章 Ancient Witch Arena Prologue
description:
The full version has new characters, enemies, maps, skills, difficulty & more! Follow the wishlist!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2112200/_Ancient_Witch_Arena/



Game Features

  • The prologue can use 5 legendary heroes, each with their own powerful special skills.
  • Multiple mode system, flexible application, greatly affects the battlefield situation.
  • A tense and exciting boss battle.
  • Each battle of the battlefield random system has a different and brand-new experience.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2112200/_Ancient_Witch_Arena/

Add full version to wishlist!

  • Unlock all Legendary Heroes.
  • Unlock all maps.
  • More challenging bosses.
  • Over 50 types of enemy units.
  • Various map traps.
  • Upgrade growth system.
  • Unlock all skills and fury mode.
  • Difficulty mechanics.
  • Dozens of epic music.
  • Achievements.
